headline: Is It Too Late To Consider Monolithic Power Systems (MPWR) After Its Surge To US$1,173?
summary: If you are wondering whether Monolithic Power Systems at US$1,173.18 is priced for perfection or still offers value, the next sections will walk through what the current market tag might be implying. The stock has had a mixed recent patch, with a 2.0% decline over the last 7 days, a 13.6% gain over 30 days, and returns of 25.3% year to date and 70.8% over the last year, plus 148.7% over 3 years and 213.6% over 5 years. Recent coverage of Monolithic Power Systems has focused on the company as...
